name: BMI Calculator
description: This application shows if the user has healthy weight. The app calculates the body mass index(BMI) based on the user's weight and height.

name: Guess-the-number
description: This is a simple game where user is trying to guess the number. The  user can guess up to 10 times, after the tenth the computer is winning the game.

name: Password Generator
description: This application generates random password. By clicking on "Generate Password" button, options of different types of symbols will be given. The user can decide what symbols likes to include.

name: Spring Gallery
description: This is a simple image gallery build with React and Tailwind.

name: Weather App
description: This is an app providing weather forecast when user enter city name. It also saving the searched cities

name: Arcade
description: This is an example desing of a magazine article.

name: Cascade Cafe
description: This is an example desing of a coffee shop menu page.
